After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.KPIS: Supply chain lead time reduction rate.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.EXPLANATION: Rate at which the time required to complete the supply chain process is reduced, measured as the percentage decrease in lead time over a specified period.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.FORMULA: (Previous Lead Time - Current Lead Time) / Previous Lead Time * 100

After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.EXPLANATION: Measure of supplier performance based on the accuracy, timeliness, and completeness of deliveries, calculated through performance evaluations and metrics.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.FORMULA: Average Performance Score of Supplier Deliveries

After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.EXPLANATION: Measure of how effectively supply chain partners work together to achieve mutual goals, based on feedback, communication quality, and joint performance metrics.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.FORMULA: Average Collaboration Effectiveness Score within the Supply Chain

After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.EXPLANATION: Effectiveness of strategies and actions taken to identify and manage risks within the supply chain, evaluated through risk assessments and incident analysis.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.FORMULA: (Number of Successfully Mitigated Risks / Total Number of Risks) * 100

After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.KPIS: Supply chain cost reduction initiatives ROI.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from cost reduction initiatives within the supply chain compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.FORMULA: (Net Benefits from Cost Reduction Initiatives / Total Cost of Initiatives) * 100

After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.EXPLANATION: Rate at which transparency in the supply chain is improved, based on metrics such as visibility of processes, information sharing, and reporting.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.FORMULA: (Current Transparency Level - Previous Transparency Level) / Previous Transparency Level * 100

After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to recover from supply chain disruptions, reflecting the effectiveness of contingency plans and response strategies.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.FORMULA: Average Time to Recover from Supply Chain Disruptions

After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.EXPLANATION: Measure of the environmental and social sustainability of supply chain practices, based on factors like carbon footprint, resource usage, and ethical sourcing.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Supply.FORMULA: Average Sustainability Score of the Supply Chain
